overview: Based on a true story the film tells the story of Svend who fights to save his elderly parents' marriage even though it has made his life almost unbearable. When he meets Lizzie he discovers how big a part of his family's hatred and jealousy he himself is. The only thing left is the ultimate break off, or the ultimate forgiveness.
tagline: En ny film af Jesper W. Nielsen, instruktøren af 'Okay'
title: The Bouncer
